com.spacetimecat.java.lang

Class Unchecked

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.spacetimecat.java.lang.Unchecked

  • public final class Unchecked
extends java.lang.Object

    Handle suppressed throwables.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Unchecked(java.lang.Throwable original)
      An optional unchecked throwable.

    • Method Summary

    • Constructor Detail

      • Unchecked

        public Unchecked(java.lang.Throwable original)

        An optional unchecked throwable.

        Parameters:
        original - can be null

    • Method Detail

      • raise

        public void raise()

        Throw the throwable.

        If this is empty, this does nothing.

        If the throwable is a checked exception, it is wrapped as the cause of an UncheckedException.

      • add

        public void add(java.lang.Throwable another)

        If this is empty, the argument becomes the throwable.

        If this already contains a throwable, this adds the argument as the suppressed throwable of the original throwable.

        Parameters:
        another - the argument

      • isEmpty

        public boolean isEmpty()

      • runAndCatch

        public void runAndCatch(java.lang.Runnable action)

        Run the action; if the action throws a throwable, the throwable is added to this.

        Parameters:
        action - what to run

      • callAndCatch

        public <T> T callAndCatch(java.util.concurrent.Callable<T> action)
